name: Rangers in Campaign
description:
Since the creation of the British commandos, the US High Command had thought of creating a unit specialized in hand strikes and capable of working behind enemy lines. The men chosen for this became an elite battalion, Darby's Rangers. After training like no other, the 1st Ranger Battalion went into combat during the invasion of Africa. A legend had begun. 

Gather your platoon around a table and emulate the Rangers like never before. Invade the Axis positions in Africa. Make Rommel retreat. Assault Sicily and participate in the invasion of Europe. Maybe you will achieve glory. 

Or not.
